item.title: VRT
item.description: score:85 Chances: Vertiv Holdings Co. (VRT) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Vertiv Holdings Co. (VRT) is equivalent to a Buy, indicating positive sentiment from analysts.
